page.title: 14BRENTWOOD SHOPS
page.content: Trade is good in Brentwood. The most used food shop is{Sainsbury's.}The most used clothes shop is{Marks and {Spencer.}The general public think that Brentwood shopping centre needs more department stores. We found out this information by asking the public questions in a survey. { Shopping Patterns:}Brentwood has about 180 shops. It has 4 main food shops, 3 chemists, 2 betting shops, 6 banks, 5 building societies and 12 clothes shops, 5 shoe shops and light electrical shops. The Brentwood branch of{Marks and {Spencer}is small compared to others in the country although they are at the top for the most sales of fish and wine. They employ 130 staff including part-time staff. Their weekly takings are Â£140,000 but in a Christmas week the takings are about Â£350,000.
